title: DEVICE AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING POLYMER FIBER AND USE OF POLYMER FIBER
fig_desc: FIG. 6 is a schematic diagram of a device having a heating unit and a solvent evaporation chamber for producing a polymeric fiber material according to an embodiment of the present disclosure.
all_fig_descs: FIG. 6 is a schematic diagram of a device having a heating unit and a solvent evaporation chamber for producing a polymeric fiber material according to an embodiment of the present disclosure.
